1.content: Which Sonic will you follow? Note: when you choose a Sonic to follow, STAY in that Sonic's continuity. If characters, plot points, or anything from a Sonic continuity appears in another in which it didn't already exist, a reason MUST be given for the crossover. If not, I will delete it. Examples I will not tolerate: Archie characters in the SEGA universe, Sonic X's Christopher ends up in the UK Sonic the Comic, etc. Also, under no circumstances will I allow original characters with the exception of Adventures, Underground, or STC.

1132321.content:
Before Sonic could continue on his way to Tails, he hears the familiar voice of Cream the Rabbit.

"Hey, Mr. Sonic."

"Oh Hey, Cream. I am on my way to visit Tails. What are you doing?"

"Mom was preparing to go to work, so Cheese and I decided to go and pick some flowers to make a wreath for her when she comes back home."
As Cream said that, she and Cheese showed off all the flowers they had been collecting. Cream then noticed the necklace that was around Sonic's neck. "Excuse me Mr. Sonic, but why are you wearing that necklace?"

"This? I found it while I was on my way to Tails. It looks rather pretty. But jewelry isn't my kind of thing. Do you want it?"

"No prob! Later!" Sonic saluted before speeding off into the distance.

Now alone, Cream looked over the necklace. It was beautiful, like something her mother would wear. But it looked a bit strange on someone so young, Cream realized.

"I wish I was an adult..." Cream sighed to herself, "Then I could look pretty in all sorts of clothes..."

Sonic was whizzing down a trail in the forest just outside New Mobtropolis. He was getting bored of the trail and began running through the woods. Dodging trees and those little animals sonic enetaly stubled into what looked like a pyramid shapped tree, but on closer examination he discovered it was actualy an lost-to-histroy templ of some sorts.

He looked around the outside and eventualy found something that looked like a door. It was incredibly thick and would take someone like Mighty of knuckles to move, but there was a small whole near the bottom right corner. It was a whole, to small to run through, but large enough to spindash through. He curled up and rushe forward. the tunnel was long and windy and Sonic popped out a few meters from where the dorr would have ended. He couldnt see very well but sundely a large torch burst into a large flame near it's top. Sonic grabbed a stck, dipped it into the fire, and ran depper into the temple. The journey was rather enjoyable for Sonic, he dodged traps rushed through mazes, and solved puzzles as he went depper into the temple and further undreground. Eventually he was in a large shrine at the very bottom of the temple, possibly over a mile down. Sveral torches light up like the first one, creating a path leading to a pedistal at the end of the room. Sonic slowwed down as he walked to it to look around. The hyroglifics had pictures of what looked like a tiger with an amulet creating the world. Others showed similar images of the same tiger creating the sun the oceans, plants, other life and fire. Sonic was now at the peddistal and on it sat a gold necklace with an ocean blue jem in the middle. Befor Sonic picked it up, the writing on the wall behind it started to glow. The glow rearagined itself from the anicent sybols to the english sonic was fluent in, and read, "Those who psses the ancient tiger god, Acuwa's necklace, shall enhieret his power over reality."

Sonic whistled "Sweet." Sonic grabbed the necklace, but suddenly the temble began to shake. The ceiling began to fall as the entire temple impolded. "Uh-oh, if thing can alter reality, lets see if it can get me out of here!" Sonic said panicing, a light blue light surounded him as a lrage rock fell on where he stood. Suddenly he was out side what used to be the temple enterence. "Heh!" Sonic chuckled "It worked! Lets see what else it can do..." Sonic fucused on his tails and watched as they suddenly grew inot a pair exactly like Tails'. Sonic flew for a moment and got back on the ground. "Cool. He said as the Tails shrank back into him. 134332.content: What about one of the three remaining Freedom Fighters?
134332.title: Someone else

135.content: So who's personality would he mess with?
135.title: Mess with people's personality.

1352.content: Oh yes the coyote who would bicker with him often, what shall it be changed to?
1352.title: Antoine's

13521.content: With a smile Sonic mentally commanded the necklace to change his personality to be more feminine as a light suddenly engulfed Antoine, leaving him covered in makeup while wearing a blue dress as Bunnie walked over to him and spoke as if Antoine was always like that, it seems Bunnie has become the man in the relationship despite their genders didn't change, should he do that to them?
13521.title: Feminine

choices: Sonic decides to mess with them more
Sonic leaves to mess with others
135211.content: Sonic laughed to himself as they swapped genders with no acknowledgement from either over the sudden change as they began to make love.
135211.title: Yes

1353.content: Perhaps a Freedom Fighter (not Antoine as he has already been listed) or a Chaptix member?
1353.title: Someone else

choices: On with the story alternate beginning
14.content: Sonic The Comic, for those who don't know, is a Sonic comic that was realeased in the UK and has a diverse enough setting to be recognized by SEGA as a Sonic series in it's own right. The comic proper ended after Sonic evolved into his current look. However, the series is still going on with STC Online. I don't know the details personally, but that means this is the one story I will allow people to not follow the rules outlined in chapter 1.
14.title: Sonic The Comic Sonic

choices: Classic Era Sonic (Since that is different than Sega Sonic)
151.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog

152.content: So who finds the necklace?
152.title: Sonic Underground

1523.content: So who finds the necklace?
1523.title: Someone else

info.brief_description: Sonic gets a necklace that controls reality.
info.description: Sonic finds a necklace that can control reality. Inspired by "The Necklaces Curse" by Dutch91 here on writing .com. Go to that story to understand how the necklace works. Also, I want to lay some ground rules: Sonic with the necklace can travel between different versions of his world, NOT into other series entirely (like mario); tg, tf, mental changes and swapping are encouraged; toilet humor, vore, descriptive sex scenes (no more than 1 chapter if you want to be detailed), and poor grammer are not allowed and will be changed or deleted; For anything else be as descriptive as you want but please make it last under two chapters; finally always leave an "other" option if you run out of ideas for additions. Have fun and please add. Before I forget, unless it is a choice chapter, try and make a paragraph long chapter.
